quotes.quote: Any workout which does not involve a certain minimum of danger or responsibility does not improve the body - it just wears it out.
Exercise is like an addiction. Once you're in it, you feel like your body needs it.
I feel better in my mind when I work out. It makes everything better.
The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
SO WHEN I'M WORKING OUT I DO THINGS EXTREME.
I'm not into working out. My philosophy: No pain, no pain.
Exercise: the more serious you are, the more fun it becomes.
Your body is worth every ounce of workout you put in it.
Exercise keeps me occupied, which is good for my mental health.
Any way to make a workout feel like playtime is great.
You need to be dedicated to your workout, whatever you choose.
Exercise is labor without weariness.
Exercise is bunk. If you are healthy you don't need it. If you are sick you shouldn't take it.
Exercise is good for your mind, body, and soul.
When it comes to health, diet is the Queen, but exercise is the King.
Exercise because it's good for you even if every step weighs a thousand pounds.
Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
We were made to exercise. We feel better.
Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise  will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
If the body be feeble, the mind will not be strong.
Exercise is a dirty word.  Everytime I say it, I wash out my mouth with chocolate.
I consider exercise vulgar.  It makes people smell.
I have to exercise early in the morning, before my brain figures out what the hell I'm doing.
We do not stop exercising because we grow old?we grow old because we stop exercising.
